data.message: Just want to say to you Eminem that you helping in Detroit Michigan with the water problem is remarkable!  Thats what shows you who you are and what you are.  When I heard you did that I went to my piano and played my piano with my ears and created a very different beat basically that I felt at the time. Thanks for creating that emotion for me! Your very talented and I listen to all of your music and think you should never stop doing what you do cause you are a Rap God! Thanks for your time
